Bitstamp Earn Lending: December 2024 Performance Report is here
Get a clear view of Bitstamp Earn Lending’s performance in December 2024 with key insights and straightforward analysis.

December wrapped up a steady and consistent year for Bitstamp Earn Lending. With the markets settling after a dynamic year, our focus remained on delivering reliable performance and transparent updates to keep you informed.

Our December 2024 Lending Performance Report is now live. This report is designed to give you a clear and simple view of how our lending product performed last month.

What’s inside the report?

Here’s what you can expect:

  • Portfolio activity: A detailed look at performance metrics, loan activity, and asset distribution.
  • Borrower metrics: Insights into borrower leverage and financial stability.
  • Risk management: How collateral levels were maintained, and risks were managed.

Our commitment to transparency means you’ll always get a clear picture of how our lending product is performing, with no unnecessary complexity.

Download the report.

* The availability of Bitstamp Earn Lending depends on many considerations, including the entity to which you are onboarded and the jurisdiction where you reside. Lending is not available in the US, UK, and Singapore.
